title: Google\Cloud\Datastore\EntityTrait
name: EntityTrait
description:
A trait to provide Datastore Entity functionality to classes.

This class fulfills the Google\Cloud\Datastore\EntityInterface requirements.

params.name: key
params.description: The Entity's Key, defining its unique identifier. Defaults to null.

params.name: entity
params.description: The entity body. Defaults to [].

params.name: options
params.description: Configuration Options

params.name: options.cursor
params.description: Set only when the entity is obtained by a query result. If set, the entity cursor can be retrieved from Google\Cloud\Datastore\Entity::cursor().

params.name: options.baseVersion
params.description: Set only when the entity is obtained by a query result. If set, the entity cursor can be retrieved from Google\Cloud\Datastore\Entity::baseVersion().

params.name: options.excludeFromIndexes
params.description: A list of entity keys to exclude from datastore indexes.

params.name: options.meanings
params.description: A list of meaning values for entity properties.

params.name: options.populatedByService
params.description: Indicates whether the entity was created as the result of a service request.

methods.name: build
methods.description: A factory method, used by the Datastore client to create entities.

params.name: key
params.description: The Entity's Key, defining its unique identifier. Defaults to null.

params.name: entity
params.description: The entity body. Defaults to [].

params.name: options
params.description: Configuration Options

params.name: options.cursor
params.description: Set only when the entity is obtained by a query result. If set, the entity cursor can be retrieved from Google\Cloud\Datastore\Entity::cursor().

params.name: options.baseVersion
params.description: Set only when the entity is obtained by a query result. If set, the entity cursor can be retrieved from Google\Cloud\Datastore\Entity::baseVersion().

params.name: options.excludeFromIndexes
params.description: A list of entity keys to exclude from datastore indexes.

params.name: options.meanings
params.description: A list of meaning values for entity properties.

params.name: options.populatedByService
params.description: Indicates whether the entity was created as the result of a service request.

methods.name: getProperty
methods.description:
Get a single property from the entity data.

If the property does not exist, this method will return null.

params.name: property
params.description: The name of an entity property to return.

methods.name: set
methods.description:
Set the entity data

Calling this method replaces the entire entity body. To add or modify a single value on the entity, use the array syntax for assignment.

params.name: entity
params.description: The new entity body.

methods.name: setProperty
methods.description:
Set the value of a single entity property.

If the property already exists, the value will be overwritten. If it does not exist, it will be added.

params.name: property
params.description: The property name.

params.name: value
params.description: The property value.

methods.name: cursor
methods.description:
Fetch the cursor

This is only set when the entity was obtained from a query result. It can be used to manually paginate results.

Implemented in Google\Cloud\Datastore\EntityOptionsTrait

methods.name: baseVersion
methods.description:
Fetch the baseVersion

This is only set when the entity was obtained from a query result. It is used for concurrency control internally.

Implemented in Google\Cloud\Datastore\EntityOptionsTrait

methods.name: populatedByService
methods.description:
Indicate whether the entity was created as the result of an API call.

Implemented in Google\Cloud\Datastore\EntityOptionsTrait

methods.name: setExcludeFromIndexes
methods.description:
A list of entity properties to exclude from datastore indexes.

Implemented in Google\Cloud\Datastore\EntityOptionsTrait

params.name: properties
params.description: A list of properties to exclude from indexes.

methods.name: excludedProperties
methods.description:
Return a list of properties excluded from datastore indexes.

Implemented in Google\Cloud\Datastore\EntityOptionsTrait

methods.name: meanings
methods.description:
Return a list of meaning values.

Implemented in Google\Cloud\Datastore\EntityOptionsTrait
